Workflow.Name: [ESSEXAMPLE] ServiceNow Order Item
Workflow.Description: This flow starts when a user submits item details and their username. It retrieves the relevant catalog item from ServiceNow, checks if all required information is provided using AI, and then places an order for the selected item. After the order is created, the flow responds to the user with the order number and system ID. The process is automated to streamline catalog item selection and ordering, ensuring user input is validated and the order is successfully created in ServiceNow.
